The Trans Luxury Hotel
8.8 Excellent
Based on 2157 reviews

I travel a fair bit for work and mostly, I needed a place with great location. This trip, unfortunately, I just needed somewhere to stay for a night and decided to opt for this hotel to pamper myself too.

I read good reviews so I decided to give this a try. The first moment when I entered the hotel, I was greeted by welcoming scent of freshness and this fragrance usually found in branded hotels. I love the high ceilings in its interior and everything from there onwards was nothing short of a good wow factor. The interior of my room (premium) reminds me of Sofitel Melbourne except this was a good one on its own. I love that the shower and toilet are separated, a big tub, thoughtful in many ways. The sound of the TV is limited at 20 which I thought was a good idea as not to disturb others. The curtain was automated and I liked the pillows. So really nothing to complain. There is a mall next to it and it is connected to the hotel so no worries if it was a rainy day. The trans studio is just next to it too. It's a world on its own if you do not wish to explore other cafes/street shops in Bandung. Oh and do check out their 18th floor restaurant - really wonderful al-fresco balcony where you can enjoy drinks, snacks and wonderful breeze and view. I only stayed for a night but really would go back again for more or just for a holiday.

Show more
Felia , Malaysia
Sensa Hotel Bandung
8.3 Excellent
Based on 3131 reviews

Was checking in at 2pm on saturday, they said the check in time will be at 4pm. Without any suggestion for a guest to wait at least at the pool or anywhere provided by the hotel whis caused by their uncommon "check in time policy".

Reception staffs were also so unhelpfull, instead of checking to their house keeping whether the room would have been ready to be used, they just assume its not ready yet. And they do this to all guests. Even One of the receptionist turn off the information box contains check in time policy when some guests were also complaining about the policy and asking how the hotel manage the guests to be seated until 4 pm ?? Will not recommend this hotek to anyone! Beside , the shows their hotwl rate is 8.1 agoda version. haha it was the award back in 2014 though. If its in 2017, i think the will probably got 4/10. Aligned with their check in time!

Show more
Tri , Indonesia
Hilton Bandung Hotel
8.7 Excellent
Based on 2969 reviews

We decided to do a quick getaway for our 10th anniversary near Jakarta and dont want to travel far. So, we decided on a one day trip to Bandung.

Now, I am a person who dislike a crowded and traffic jam area. Bandung would have so much traffic during the weekend mostly because of Jakarta visitors. So, this hotel is a perfect spot for us. We arrive early in the morning on friday to go Lembang area jsut to visit RumahGukGuk for the mini zoo (kids love thos animals lol) before it gets crowded in the afternoon. Nearby the hotel is an outdoor food complex with great choices of food, Pasir Kaliki Food Festival (if not mistaken) is just 5 min walk, but I suggest to just drive if you bring car and come early like 6 pm cause at night, it gets crowded. Else, get uber or gojek to go there. We pretty much stay at the hotel for the whole day, enjoying the pool with great weather. The staff is great & helpful, although our room was only ready at 4 pm (we requested earlier than 2 pm, which is the standard time the hotel sets).

Show more
Budhi , Indonesia
InterContinental Bandung Dago Pakar
8.5 Excellent
Based on 595 reviews

We had stayed for 2 days. The hotel was very nice, with very beautiful view. But we have a disguisting experience on the room we'd stayed.

Since there was a left underwear of the previous guest was still hanging on the room. I was guessing weather the room had been clean or not. We arrived late at night, and had a littlebit arguing with the front desk manager, that said my special request did not stated to the hotel upon agoda request. But it was settled quickly by the manager. And then after we get the room, well I need to clean up but the toiletries was not ready. So need to call up asking for soap etc in the middle of the night and waiting was quite time consuming. Bed was comfortable. The Food had many kind of variation but very average taste, quite so average for 5 star hotel. Guess the hotel need to upgrade all the staff with not only manners but need improvement on staffs with 5 stars quality. But the hotel was beautiful, but i guess i would not recomend.

Show more
Emilia , Indonesia
Best Western Premier La Grande Hotel
8 Very good
Based on 608 reviews

This is our second time staying at the hotel. Our first one the hotel was brand new. It surprised me when we stayed second time because they have few restaurants and mini mart on the same area with the hotel which i think is a plus! My daughter love the pool so much because the water is warm and semi-indoor so we can still enjoy the swim eventhough it's raining and but chilly outside.

But i am quite dissapointed that our bathroom is a bit smelly and i think the smell came out from the water closet. Overall we are happy with the stay.

Show more
Hendriko , Indonesia
Aryaduta Bandung
8.4 Excellent
Based on 774 reviews

room is spacious as well as the toilet. ameeties were standards and good. facilities were good. The garden were good for relaxing as well as the pool.

everything almost great. The staff were good to guest. Like other comments, to breakfast buffet a little bit lacking. anyway it is okay. Have various selection but not as expected. As for shoppers, the location were nice since its nearby to various factory outlet. You may need to walk in radius 1km and you will found plenty shops that suits your need. Bandung may be on heavy traffic most of time so u may walk to any shop nearby you. anyway you can use Grab to move around the town. if you craving for late night snack, you can always go to Mcdonalds which inside of a mall that is connected to the hotel.

Show more
asyraf , Malaysia
The Luxton Hotel
7.9 Very good
Based on 2286 reviews

Everything seems to be great when we arrived, good reception staff, nice room and great location, but then the we found out that they dont change the amenities, no water replacement and no hair dryer.

For those who bring their own car, it can be problem as well, yes they provide valet, but i just dont feel comfortable when evertime simeone need to drive our car without any guarantee that the car will be ok. Other than items mentioned above, everything was great.

Show more
Ernest , Indonesia
Aston Pasteur
8.1 Excellent
Based on 441 reviews

I was staying just one night. The reason I choose this hotel because I guess its a new building and the location.

Then I stayed in 5th floor with other 2 colleagues (I choose Family Room type). So surprised when I opened the window, it seems the outside glass was never cleaned. Its very dirty. In the room, there are 2 small bottles in bathroom and 1 large bottle in the bedroom. Logically, I choose rooms for 3 persons, then it was good they serve 3 towels, but they only serve 2 small complimentary bottles. then I used Housekeeping number to ask the Iron, it was busy for long time, so I used Room Service dial to ask about it. Then, I had to wait more than 20 mins to get the iron until I dialed Housekeeping again. In the morning, I came for breakfast at 7 am. the choice of food were so poor even they Hainan Fried Rice stall was empty for long time. taste was also very bad. I was disappointed to see variety of food. In the Gorengan stall, food was cold and also for Soto Bandung. Again, I had to wait 15 minutes to get my omelette, even I had to remind the chef twice. My breakfast were only good for a cup of cappuccino which I had to pay 18,000 IDR. I guess I will never again to recommend this place for business trip

Show more
Dyni , Indonesia
El Royale Hotel Bandung
7.7 Very good
Based on 4293 reviews

First of all, the 5 nights stay in this hotel was pleasant. The room was spacious, value for money, the staff were really friendly and helpful, provided breakfast was normal.

The pool and gym were great. However, there is no indication of old tower or new tower when making booking on Agoda. The front desk said extra charges will apply for room in new tower. The bathroom was not in great condition, the bathtub wall was peeling off, and noticeable rusty parts in bathroom. The bath towels looks old and yellow. Lastly, I called the housekeeping for an iron. However, the staff came to my room and told me that they have no iron for guests and only provide laundry services. End up, I paid around USD10+ for my clothes to get iron. Frankly, first time I encountered this issue.

Show more
Ping , Malaysia
Aston Braga Hotel & Residence Bandung
7.8 Very good
Based on 3567 reviews

I travel for business on many occassions and have stayed in a 4-5 star hotels like Hyatt, Swissotel, Fairmont, Sheraton, etc.

Perhaps the 4-star given to Aston Braga is false given how bad the hotel, facilities, room, etc. We stayed here 6 years ago and we stayed again for 9 nights in July 16. We got a Non-smoking 3 bdroom suite on the 17th floor. First of all, a 4 star hotel must have a clean, neat outlook. The carpet is dirty, bathroom needs a huge update, the kitchen counter is made of wood with not enough utensils, pots/pans. The AC works in each room but we were able to smell smoke coming out from other rooms. The restaurant that serves breakfast needs to update their table cloth and chairs. We're were able to smell smoke coming from outside. The swimming pool was awful. There were algae growing in all 4 corners. The Aston Braga is urgently in need of a serious upgrade. What I like about this hotel is the people are very nice but they do need training. If I were to grade this hotel: I would give it a one star.

Show more
JOHANN , United States
De Paviljoen Bandung by HIM
8.5 Excellent
Based on 295 reviews

Yes, if only they didn't make that silly mistake during our check out. We stayed for 1 night at room 718 from 5-6 of March 2017.

All the experience were excellent until they ruin it during our check out. At night before we went to sleep, i asked help from the concierge at the front lobby to freeze my wife's pumped breast milk together with the ice pack and we'll get it back during check out. I knew i've explain it loud and clear and they understood to put it in the freezer not the chiller. In the morning during check out, we're shocked that the milk and the ice pack were not frozen at all. trust me, it won't last for 3 hours journey to Jakarta. They're claiming that their freezer were not working properly, even at the meat and fresh food station. I find the reason as ridicolous and doesn't make any common sense. As a hotel, they surely have plenty of freezer, plus they should've told me in the beginning if they cant freeze the milk, i can find some place else. I asked for a resolution to the front desk plus the Manager in charge to provide me with a dry ice to save the milk through a 3 hours to Jakarta but they can't provide it. I don't know whether they really looking for it or not. They gave me a contact to check rather than looking it for us for their mistake. So for all breastfeeding mothers and supporting fathers, if you're staying at this hotel, please reconsider again if you want to store your pumped milk at their premises. The freezer might not working. Maybe their food ingredients are not serve fresh as well if they don't have any freezer working, only God knows that. As for others: 1. location were great, right in the heart of Riau street and near to FO's 2. if you're in to running, GOR Saparua jogging track is nearby which only took about 500 m to reach 3. staff were nice and friendly 4. design and architecture were also great with a theme of collonial dutch feel 5. standard room were also nice, wifi were great, TV channels are plenty,

Show more
amiranti , Indonesia
HARRIS Hotel & Conventions Ciumbuleuit Bandung
8.2 Excellent
Based on 1203 reviews

This was our second stay in Harris Ciumbuleuit as we cannot get comparable hotel in terms of location, room rate (Agoda), facilities (incl.

free high speed internet), and the policy that until 12 yo children is not considered adult. The room is spacious made it more comfortable for family. At this this time the sky pool was unfortunately under maintenance but the hotel managed to route us to the pool in Galeri Ciumbuleuit (connected building). Responsive and warm handle by the staff, the same experience with our previous stay. The location is perfect for us as it less likely has heavy traffic (unless you are going to Lembang, which is the main road access is quite close). Going back to Jakarta is also easier than staying in the city center. This time we stayed without breakfast but the foods here is considered not too expensive. As alternative there are many foodstall nearby or simply order via Go-Jek/Go-Food :).

Show more
DADANG , Indonesia
Golden Flower Hotel
7.5 Very good
Based on 2209 reviews

From entrance to the front desk & room to dining, i felt something is different about Golden Flower. Ground staff greet us with full of smile and help to carry our luggage.

Lobby ambiance was so nice even some section look a bit archaic. Front desk officer; Ms Yanti and partner, greet us with a pleasant smile, quick arrange our rooms (5 rooms/3 family) and able to mitigate some serious issue professionally. Rooms : Decent, clean and comfort. Breakfast served local and international delicacy and tasty. Location : Walking distance to Pasar Baru and Pasar Kota Kembang (Beside Zodiak) Ms Alin (GRO) approached and likely to share our stay experience and wrote some feedback & comment for improvement. Cheerful moment : Compliment chocolate. Thanks to all staff from lobby to front desk (Ms Yanti & Partner), housekeeping (Mr Mahmud & gang) to dining (Ms NurElis & Chef) for been there for us, serve with tasty food and make our family feel so inviting. :) #Goldenfloweradvisetostay

Show more
Khairil , Malaysia
Four Points by Sheraton Bandung
8.6 Excellent
Based on 215 reviews

First, I am thankful for Mr Pandhu's initiative to upgrade my room and Helsya cooperation on my check in time, yet I still hope the coordination between staff should be improved to avoid any unnecessary irritating miscommunication.

Overall it was a pleasant stay: the room is neatly designed and clean. Houskeeping staff are very helpful. Morning buffet is okay, but it is below my expectation (needs improvement on the quality of bakery n pastry section) Since I stayed for mainly bedresting, my complaint would be on the poor quality of the TV, and a very limited choices of channel (compare to normally available on every other hotel with similar rank). Last but not least, the most dissappointing experience is the check out time,when I came to find that the hospitality of the front desk end with your check out signature.

Show more
hasmiyah , Indonesia
Ivory By Ayola Hotel
8.4 Excellent
Based on 1097 reviews

The interior of the hotel are so pretty, altough the interior of the room are just like regular hotel but the room is pretty spacious with sofa and fridge, the breakfast is good with enough variation and the highlight was the free coffee The staff were nice but i notice that almost all the staff were so young therefore they seem lack of experience but that's ok The winning point of this hotel is of course the location almost every FO&good resto is in walking distance The downside is when i arrive (we booked 2 rooms) they don't provide liquid soap and new tissue, when we asked them they said they running out of the soap.

..but the next day they finally gave us the soap If only this hotel provide pool this would be a perfect hotel for family

Show more
Amalina , Indonesia
Grand Mercure Bandung Setiabudi
8.5 Excellent
Based on 988 reviews

Great service at this hotel, the staff were always helpful and accommodating. The check in process however was quite slow as there are only 2 counters.

Things to note - bottled water in the restaurant cost IDR30K which is abit steep - opt for soft drinks instead. Buffet breakfast has a good international spread on offer. A little further out from the action of the main clubbing / shopping/ food streets coupled with Bandung's traffic situation, you are better off grabbing the local bus then the taxis.

Show more
Pamela , Singapore
Galeri Ciumbuleuit Family & Business Hotel
7.5 Very good
Based on 3707 reviews

I stayed in the hotel for 3 days on 25 August - 28 August 2016, was amazing with the area where the hotel at.

. Just amazing and great weather totally the best day ever. I brought my family to enjoying a short together in Bandung before my return to Dubai. I booked a deluxe twins room which fitted for 3-5 people. The room was ok but once I check around its just sad, it was mentioned the hotel it's 4 star but I can't see any of 4 stars standard (I should says far from that). I took some pictures during the time I seen all the unpleasant things in the room, yet I go directly to their reception fr reporting that I am not satisfy with their room and asked about the new room. Asep as a supervisor in charge that time was shocked right after I show him the pictures that I took. It is my great day, we good free upgrade to the Junior Suit. The room it's beautiful, big space and just right. Meanwhile I'm still a bit curious is there any bad things inside the room or everything just fine now? So I walk around the room to check. The shower door was broken and can't be able to close properly, some of the window lock not working but that's ok. A day after me and family decided to bring kids for swimming (hotel swimming pool). The swimming pool it's amazing but the area was "more amazing" (hiperbola), I can't believe they call this place as a 4 stars hotel. Start from the gym, walking to the changing area eveyyhing just gone wrong and I feel kind of wasted my time and money to choose and bring my family here. I'll show you what I altar king about with the pictures that I took. Surely you'll be shock same as I do!! Meanwhile I am a traveler and i have been more than 10 countries to review their place (hotel).

Show more
Dhany , Indonesia
The Majesty Business and Family Hotel
7.3 Very good
Based on 1402 reviews

It's a satisfying experience. The moment you enter the lobby, you could tell that this building been around for quite some time.

You could feel the oldness of it. Got 2 guest elevators and 1 staff elevator. It's Ok I guess, but during my 2 day stay there, one of the guest elevator kept having problem. 2 or 3 times. We booked for 1 Superior, 1 Junior Suite and 1 Grand Suite. Once we entered those rooms, it was all good. I believe they're been renovated not too long ago. Clean and spacious. The old feeling only found at the bathroom. They done a good job keeping the room clean. The only down side from the rooms was the mattresses. Even tho they use King Size for the double bed, they still using old thin spring bed. So when you have a partner that moved a lot while sleeping, be prepared that the mattress will wake you up :p As for the breakfast, it was just only standard. Not many variations. But if you're the type that only have lite breakfast, it won't bother you. They have the standard eggs, porridge, cereal, toast, etc. Overall, if you're on a budget, it's not a bad choice. Especially when you're looking for a hotel with a living room. With their price tag, you can't go wrong

Show more
ABRAHAM , Indonesia
Art Deco Luxury Hotel & Residence
8.5 Excellent
Based on 100 reviews

New hotel located at ciumbeuluit area, if you want a quiet and cool air, this is the right place. Has a restaurant and pool with beautiful Bandung City View at 10th floor.

Still soft opening when we stayed, so the gym still not ready, no children playground. Room was comfortable, but bathroom was small. Breakfast just ok. Minibar is included(drinking water, peanut & chips), but only once, even the drinking water. We stayed for 2 nights and staff didn't fill the drinking water and the minibar at the next day... I asked the staff about that, and guess the answer... only once she said... hmm Overall we love to stay there and will stay there again...

Show more
antony , Indonesia
The Papandayan Hotel
8.2 Excellent
Based on 705 reviews

This is our second time staying in Papandayan Hotel for our short vacation in Bandung. Our stay in Papandayan has always been a pleasant one, with excellent service by the entire hotel staff, clean rooms and great food served in the restaurant.

We were always greeted by their warm greetings and smiles. I would like to thank the staff at hotel lobby who helped to support and handhold my mum (who has knee problem) while she climbed the stairs to enter to the lobby and to the hotel lifts. When we checked out from the hotel, though there was a tiny hiccup in my room (no welcome fruits like my parents' room), I did not brought up that matter as I thought it was not trivial. However, my mother gave that feedback and to our surprise, the hotel staff quickly packed for us some fruits to be brought back home. We are touched with the attention given by the hotel staff to each of their patron. Well done Papadayan and team for your excellent service!

Show more
Shamsiah , Singapore
THE 1O1 Bandung Dago Hotel
7.6 Very good
Based on 1137 reviews

I booked 2 trendy duplex room - Room 5005 & 5015 Room 5005 - 1 TV & 1 aircon Room 5015 - 2 TVs & 2 aircon I feel shortchanged for room 5005 as I paid same amount but provided lesser amenities.

I don't understand why a big 2 storey room has only 1 home quality aircon system. I did feedback to the reception counter on the first night but no service rendered. The fridge for both rooms is not cold - also feedbacked to the counter & no follow up. One of the nights, the roof for room 5005 was leaking due to the heavy rain. Thankfully, the staff assisted us promptly and we managed to move to another room.Thumbs up! (+) The view on the river was amazing. Rooms are new and cozy. Sound isolation is great, you hear almost no noise from outside or other guests.

Car with a driver from hotel was cheap: 250K IDR for first 4 hours, then 50K IDR per hour. They provide a lot of stuff: soap, shower gel, etc but no shampoo if I remember well. There is a fridge. They provide a tv with one of the channels playing recent movies. There is a mini private garden in front of your room with a gate that you can close. Hint for the hotel management: you should add a small outdoor table with chairs in that mini garden, it would be so nice. Adding a small outdoor drying rack for hanging our cloths there would be a plus as well. Food at restaurant was good and for reasonable price. They have beer (not always the case in Indonesia). Western food was surprisingly good (carbonara pasta + cordon bleu). (-) Don't go outside of the hotel on foot, there is nothing special and it's dangerous because there is only a busy road with no sidewalk. You need your own vehicle or rent a car with driver from hotel. No safety box at all, even at the reception. From the hotel to airport they charge a ridiculously expensive price of 350K IDR. The staff will tell u that it's impossible for the taxis to find hotel. Don't listen to them, call yourself Blue Bird taxi company to send you a cab. When calling make sure there is a local beside you (preferably the driver of the hotel) in order to help the company with the hotel location. It's what we did and it all went like a charm for 150K IDR only (~2h). Restaurant was good in general but: Bolognese sauce was quite bad though (therefore also avoid lasagna). Wenny , Indonesia
SanGria Resort & Spa
7.6 Very good
Based on 284 reviews

The hotel has shown signs of aging, but overall still maintain an acceptable quality for a hotel on its class.

Location is perfect, midway between Grand Hotel Lembang and the intersection to Jl Kolonel Masturi, so it is very convenient of you want to explore Lembang and/or other attractions in Kolonel Masturi / Sersan Bajuri area. In addition, the hotel is very quiet and serene. Within 10 minutes driving radius you can get to POM Tahu, Lembang city center, Lembang Floating Market, De Ranch, Bosscha Observatory and all other dining and recreational activities in Lembang. Check-in process is impressive. The FO staff has even prepare for our arrival, all the amenities (room key, etc) has been prepared prior to our arrival. Check out is also done in a breeze. Swimming pool is nice, although we found it to be a bit cold. A small jacuzzi is a nice escape from the cold pool. A small sauna which is operating near the pool is a nice touch. Another plus is the hotel's breakfast policy which allows for 2 adults + 1 children per room. Breakfast is quite standard with some local fare on the menu. Room service menu is quite expensive. You don't need to worry if you start to feel hungry : Tahu Susu Lembang / POM Tahu with its food court is only about 200 meters away form hotel's entrance, so you can always take a leisurely 10 minutes (uphill) walk. Be warned that the road between SanGria and POM Tahu gets really dark at night with almost no light, so consider take a torchlight with you, or alternatively just take your car to POM Tahu. The only negative thing is that the hotel has wrongly billed me for an in-room service ordered by another guest, but my complaint is handled quickly and professionally by the FO staff. As soon as I complaint, she called the Restaurant Manager and the waiters who delivered the order, whom all quickly acknowledge that I am not the one who made the order. Overall staff performance is superb.

Well, since I spent my college years in this city, I formed a special bond with Bandung. All I can say is that: be considerate.

Sinaulan ,Indonesia

Although Bandung gets quite crowded and has a lot of traffic, its one of the cities I prefer to visit because of the cooler weather.

Public transportation is easily accessible from anywhere. There are ojeks (a motorycle taxi), there are angkots (a kind of mini van with different names and colours) and then there are taxis (with meters). There's a wide range of restaurants, both Western and Asian. There are also many places to go shopping where you can find products at bargain prices. One of my favourite places to visit is a place called Pasar Baru. This is a huge market complex where you can find almost anything to by and cheap prices. You can even bargain the prices. Beware, though, this place gets very crowded after 11:00 am so hold on to your valuables as there might be pick pocketers around. Don't go to this place if you absolutely don't like crowds.

Great place if you are on the lookout for clothes bargains. This place has a heap of factory outlets that will net you some great bargains.

Being higher up in the mountains means that the temperature is cooler than the likes of Jakarta. Suggest to get there by train or air. Avoid driving if holiday periods. Downside is the traffic and the 1 way systems around the city. You have to go a long way sometimes just to get to where you want. Recommend Uber if you need to get around as local taxi's tend to try and charge fixed high priced fair. No such thing with Uber. More about Bandung

Bandung is a dynamic city boasting history, excellent shopping, and fulfilling dining and nightlife. Accommodation in the city caters to everyone from the backpacker to the luxury traveler. The city is serviced by Husein Sastranegara International Airport, located only three miles away from the city center.

Bandung is especially enjoyed by weekend travelers from Jakarta who flock to the distribution centers dealing in local high fashion and factory outlets that can generally be found in the Setiabudhi Area. As the evening hits, the multitude of bars and clubs light up and draw crowds of dancers and party-goers. Cultural experiences can be enjoyed in the several museums established here such as Museum Geologi, and sites such as Gedung Sate displays strong hints of the city’s colonial past.

Bandung offers plenty of out-of-the-city opportunities as well. The region's high elevation translates into comfortable temperatures, perfect for visiting tea plantations, hiking up dormant volcanoes, or stopping by hot springs. Taxis and car rentals are the best way to reach these areas of the countryside.

Be sure to check out the interactive map of Bandung for information on hotel locations, attractions, and must-see destinations.

This trip, unfortunately, I just needed somewhere to stay for a night and decided to opt for this hotel to pamper myself too. I read good reviews so I decided to give this a try. The first moment when I entered the hotel, I was greeted by welcoming scent of freshness and this fragrance usually found in branded hotels. I love the high ceilings in its interior and everything from there onwards was nothing short of a good wow factor. The interior of my room (premium) reminds me of Sofitel Melbourne except this was a good one on its own. I love that the shower and toilet are separated, a big tub, thoughtful in many ways. The sound of the TV is limited at 20 which I thought was a good idea as not to disturb others. The curtain was automated and I liked the pillows. So really nothing to complain. There is a mall next to it and it is connected to the hotel so no worries if it was a rainy day. The trans studio is just next to it too. It's a world on its own if you do not wish to explore other cafes/street shops in Bandung. Oh and do check out their 18th floor restaurant - really wonderful al-fresco balcony where you can enjoy drinks, snacks and wonderful breeze and view. I only stayed for a night but really would go back again for more or just for a holiday. So, we decided on a one day trip to Bandung. Now, I am a person who dislike a crowded and traffic jam area. Bandung would have so much traffic during the weekend mostly because of Jakarta visitors. So, this hotel is a perfect spot for us. We arrive early in the morning on friday to go Lembang area jsut to visit RumahGukGuk for the mini zoo (kids love thos animals lol) before it gets crowded in the afternoon. Nearby the hotel is an outdoor food complex with great choices of food, Pasir Kaliki Food Festival (if not mistaken) is just 5 min walk, but I suggest to just drive if you bring car and come early like 6 pm cause at night, it gets crowded. MD.LAIR ,Malaysia try to enjoy restaurants at lembang and dago pakar, must go places! bring your kid they would be happy theres lots of friendly animal najib ,Indonesia Discover the neighborhoods of Bandung Lembang 406 hotels Bandung City Center 394 hotels Pasteur 248 hotels Kiaracondong 218 hotels Dago 202 hotels Cihampelas 196 hotels Riau 164 hotels Sukajadi 122 hotels Cibiru 117 hotels Setiabudi 114 hotels Subang 93 hotels Dago Atas 55 hotels Ciumbuleuit 55 hotels Buahbatu 45 hotels Bandung Airport 34 hotels Soekarno Hatta Bypass 22 hotels Sekeloa 22 hotels Ciwidey 19 hotels Gegerkalong 17 hotels Cimahi Utara 12 hotels Find the Perfect Type of Accommodation Apartments in Bandung 849 Guest Houses in Bandung 293 Resorts in Bandung 83 Bungalows in Bandung 29 Hostels in Bandung 13 Motels in Bandung 2 More about Bandung Bandung is a dynamic city boasting history, excellent shopping, and fulfilling dining and nightlife. Accommodation in the city caters to everyone from the backpacker to the luxury traveler. The city is serviced by Husein Sastranegara International Airport , located only three miles away from the city center. Bandung is especially enjoyed by weekend travelers from Jakarta who flock to the distribution centers dealing in local high fashion and factory outlets that can generally be found in the Setiabudhi Area. As the evening hits, the multitude of bars and clubs light up and draw crowds of dancers and party-goers. Cultural experiences can be enjoyed in the several museums established here such as Museum Geologi , and sites such as Gedung Sate displays strong hints of the city’s colonial past. Bandung offers plenty of out-of-the-city opportunities as well. The region's high elevation translates into comfortable temperatures, perfect for visiting tea plantations, hiking up dormant volcanoes, or stopping by hot springs. Taxis and car rentals are the best way to reach these areas of the countryside. Be sure to check out the interactive map of Bandung for information on hotel locations, attractions, and must-see destinations.
